building society.translation[0].definiti: a type of bank that you pay money into in order to save it and earn interest, and that will lend you money to buy a house or apartment
building society.translation[1].definiti: an organization providing financial services to customers, especially lending money in the form of MORTGAGEs to buy a house or flat and paying interest to savers. Building societies were originally formed to help people buy or build houses with money from people who saved with the society
I would have been better off investing in a building society investment account.
